description: Abe was a young transfer student from http://anidb.net/ch39292 [Taeko]`s flashbacks. http://anidb.net/ch39292 [Taeko] thought he was disgusting and rude. He would constantly pick his nose and spit the ground. She thought Abe hated her, but http://anidb.net/ch39286 [Toshino] suggested that he actually had a crush on her.
name: Abe-kun
